name: Submit responses
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for submit the user response for each question in quiz model.

Request payload must contain the following fields:

quiz_question_id : NUMBER
selected_option: STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/quizSurveys/1/responses

raw 
  {
    "responses":[
        {
            "quiz_survey_question_id":1,
            "selected_option":"o1"   
        },
        {
            "quiz_survey_question_id":2,
            "selected_option":"o1"   
        }
    ]
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"status":200,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"quiz_response_id":16,"user_id":40,"quiz_survey_id":"1","response":"{\"1\":{\"quiz_survey_id\":\"1\",\"selected_option\":\"o1\",\"question\":\"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Diam quam nulla porttitor massa id neque aliquam vestibulum morbi.\",\"question_no\":1}}","status":"ACTIVE","created_by":40,"created_at":"2022-09-11T13:32:55.000Z","updated_by":40,"updated_at":"2022-09-15T02:57:13.849Z"}]}
